title: Kyrie Irving Defends Antisemitic Movie and Conspiracy Theory
description: Irving, the Nets guard, is facing backlash, but said he was “not going to stand down on anything I believe in.”
dc:creator: Sopan Deb
category: Hebrews to Negroes: Wake Up Black America (Movie)
media:description: Kyrie Irving, a guard for the Nets, endorsed an antigovernment conspiracy theory at a news conference Saturday.
